FuncDef: This command is used to add and remove devices from the Bluetooth whitelist or to enter the context to configure the MAC. The router only accepts pairing requests with devices that are in the whitelist. The devices are identified through their IEEE 802 MAC addresses. There can be up to six devices defined in the whitelist.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MAC address of the external Bluetooth device. Values-6-byte unicast MAC address (xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx).
